code:
classDiagram

    class Primitive {
        <<Abstract>>
    }

    class Volume {
        <<Abstract>>
    }

    class Material {
        +Ambient : Color
        +Diffuse : Color
        +Specular : Color
        +Shininess : float
        +Apply(gl : OpenGL) void
    }

    class Color {
        +Red : float
        +Green : float
        +Blue : float
        +Alpha : float
    }

    Primitive *-- "*" Material : -materials
    
    Volume *-- "1" Material : +Material

    Material *-- Color : +Ambient
    Material *-- Color : +Diffuse
    Material *-- Color : +Specular

    style Primitive fill:white
    style Volume fill:white
